name: positive
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: positive
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: full of hope and confidence, or giving cause for hope and confidence
trans_examp.trans_cn: 建设性的；积极的；怀有希望的

example.eg: On a more positive note, we're seeing signs that the housing market is picking up.
example.egtrans: 更乐观地说，我们看到了房地产市场正在好转的迹象。

example.eg: The past ten years have seen some very positive developments in East-West relations.
example.egtrans: 在过去的10年中东西方关系有了一些非常积极的发展。

example.eg: There was a very positive response to our new design - people seemed very pleased with it.
example.egtrans: 我们的新设计得到了非常积极的回应——看来人们对该产品非常满意。

dsense.name: positive
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有把握的，确信的，肯定的

example.eg: Are you positive (that) you saw me switch the iron off?
example.egtrans: 你肯定你看到我关掉了熨斗的开关吗？

example.eg: "Are you sure it's okay for me to use your mother's car?" "Positive."
example.egtrans: “你肯定我可以开你母亲的车？”“完全肯定。”

example.eg: "It was him - I saw him take it." "Are you positive about that?"
example.egtrans: “是他——我看到他拿的。”“你对此肯定吗？”

dsense.name: positive
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: (of a medical test) showing that a person has the disease or condition for which they are being tested

dsense.name: positive
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: (used to add force to an expression) complete

example.eg: Far from being a nuisance, she was a positive joy to have around.
example.egtrans: 有她在身边完全是个乐趣，一点儿都不令人讨厌。

dsense.name: positive
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: (of a number or amount) more than zero

dsense.name: positive
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: being the type of electrical charge that is carried by protons

dsense.name: positive
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: having the rhesus factor in the blood
trans_examp.trans_cn: 血液中含猕因子的；Rh阳性的

example.eg: My blood type is O positive.
example.egtrans: 我的血型是 O 型 Rh 因子呈阳性。
